projects.title: Microservices for Authoring Tool
projects.bodyText:
Led a highly skilled development team in the creation of a specialized microservice.
 - This microservice played a crucial role in efficiently copying Table of Contents (TOC) contents.
 - Took charge of the team responsible for designing and implementing Learning Objectives within the Content Authoring Tool.
 - Initiated and successfully executed a comprehensive refactoring effort, ensuring the removal of legacy class components and the adoption of a modern standalone component structure.
 - Demonstrated strong leadership and technical acumen in achieving project goals.

projects.title: Real Estate Application
projects.bodyText:
Served as the lead for the React Native development team working on a high-impact Real Estate application for one of the largest companies in Australia.
 - Guided the team through the entire development lifecycle, from inception to delivery.
 - Successfully developed the application from scratch, meeting challenging deadlines and collaborating closely with demanding clients.
 - Demonstrated effective leadership, technical expertise, and project management skills throughout the project's lifecycle.

projects.title: Content Authoring Tool
projects.bodyText:
Contributed significantly to the development of an Authoring Tool for one of the largest publishing and education companies.
 - Played a key role in creating essential elements within the tool, enhancing the Digital Content Creation process.
 - Introduced innovative features, including the Track Manager and Comment Manager Tool, providing users with advanced capabilities for managing and optimizing their content creation workflows.
 - Demonstrated proficiency in React, JavaScript, leadership, and a deep understanding of educational technology.

projects.title: Parent Connect
projects.bodyText:
As an integral part of the React Native development team for one of the largest Playschools in India.
 - Contributed to the creation of the Parent Connect application.
 - Developed modules that empowered parents to actively track their children's activities and obtain real-time insights.
 - Showcased expertise in React Native development within an educational context, fostering effective communication and engagement between parents and the educational institution.
